name: Vr Mususem Project
description:
This is a museum game for vr. You can also roam around in the game without vr too. So this is just a fun game to exporle and check out. There are pictures that go with the page too.  This is just a fun project made for Motion Capture class, so  please enjoy. this project. 

The files that are on the downlead is the game itself and the asset files.
